author: Staff Reporter
text:
Mourning the loss of veteran Communist Party of India (CPI) leader A.B. Bardhan (92), cadres of CPI took out a silent procession here on Monday. The procession started from Boltonpuram where a condolence meeting was later conducted.

Cadres of Communist Party of India (Marxist), Tamil Maanila Congress, Viduthalai Chiruthaigal Katchi and Marumalarchi Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam also took part in the procession.
title: Cadres mourn death of leader
